GAME DESCRIPTION

Enter the world of Sex Simulator - Vampires.

The process is pretty simple:

Don’t worry if you're not a great talker. We have this part covered for you.
All you need to do is flex those finger muscles to control the sex motion and make the ladies come before you run out of stamina.

Choose between 3 types of sex and positions to satisfy the ladies, and feel free to swap between the various camera angles we set up for you so you won’t miss any of the hot details happening on screen.

You didn’t get it right on the first try? Well … it happens to the best of us.
The good part is you can always try again, and again, and again…until you leave every single one of them satisfied.
